preprocessing.instance_selection.util

Class ReducersHubAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • preprocessing.instance_selection.util.ReducersHubAnalyzer

  • public class ReducersHubAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class compares different instance selection methods on a dataset. The reduction is either set to automatically determined subset size or to 10%

                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        k - Neighborhood size.
        filePath - Path to the input file.
        dMatPath - Path to the data matrix.
        outDir - Path to output directory.
        normalize - Whether to perform normalization or not.

      • loadDMatFromFile

        public static float[][] loadDMatFromFile(java.io.File dMatFile)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        dMatFile - File to load the matrix from.
        Returns:
        Upper diagonal float distance matrix, each row contains only distances d(i,j) for j > i. Therefore the length of the i-th row is len(i_th_row) = n - i - 1.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
